events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role. Our team will review your resume carefully and get back to you shortly regarding the next steps in the recruitment process.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department. We have noted your experience with software development and DevOps practices, which align well with our team's requirements.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application. They will be your point of contact moving forward and will help coordinate interviews and feedback.

The initial screening round was completed successfully. The recruiter noted your strong background in software engineering and your familiarity with DevOps tools, making you a promising candidate for the technical interview.
Thank you for promptly responding to the initial screening questionnaire and providing additional information about your previous projects related to software development and system automation.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for June 8th at 10:00 AM UTC. This session will focus on your software development skills, coding proficiency, and understanding of DevOps methodologies.

The technical interview was completed positively. The panel commended your problem-solving skills, coding efficiency, and solid grasp of DevOps concepts, indicating a strong fit for the engineering team.
An HR interview has been scheduled for June 10th at 2:00 PM UTC. This conversation will cover your career goals, company culture fit, and compensation expectations.
The HR interview went well. The HR team noted your enthusiasm for the role and the alignment of your goals with our company values, reinforcing your candidacy for the engineering position.

We have officially extended you an offer for the Software Engineer position. The offer includes a competitive salary package, benefits, and opportunities for professional growth within our engineering team.

You have shared positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining our engineering department, looking forward to contributing your skills and experience to upcoming projects.
Your acceptance of the job offer has been confirmed. We are thrilled to welcome you as a new member of our software engineering team.

The onboarding process has commenced. You have received all necessary information about company policies, tools, and introductory training sessions to help you integrate smoothly into the engineering team.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful onboarding as a Software Engineer. We look forward to your contributions and growth in our engineering department.
